Harvard University via edX

paragraphs.name: 65d1

paragraphs.text: I’ve also assembled these courses on Class Central’s collection page for Ivy League MOOCs. This collection gets updated automatically as new courses are added. You can subscribe to receive updates by clicking the blue “follow” button there.

380b3d53f37.title: Meanwhile even the worst colleges in the US feel justified raising tuition costs each year as if…

paragraphs.text: Meanwhile even the worst colleges in the US feel justified raising tuition costs each year as if their product is a scarcity, not a commodity. And American politicians keep selling it as a ticket to…something. Not always something better and in many cases, a worse situation financially.
